title: The Manipur conflict is now spilling into Assam and Mizoram. Where is the PM?
comments: 15-16 loksabha seats across 3 states are chillar for them. NRIs matter coz electoral bonds, RIs are just redundant matter.
He 's travelling, Unuted States of Amrika need vishwa guru to tell them what a shithole India was before he came to save them all.
As if "PM CARES " ,  he's out doing his favourite thing ..appeasing  NRI   bhakts
Who tf are allowing them to do so as they please in other states! That's just blatant terrorism now!

They voted for this.

schadenfreude is the emotion I'm feeling.
Gaand mara rahe hain, Amerikka me...
